objects.text:
• Premium unisex fragrance
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size
• Fresh and invigorating scent
• Elegant design with gold cap

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Captivating Freshness for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex fragrance suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Eau de Toilette concentration for perfect daily wear
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Fresh and invigorating scent profile
• Modern and minimalist packaging
• Perfect for daily wear and special occasions
• Professional-grade fragrance by BELLAVITA
• Travel-friendly size bottle
• Ideal gift choice for fragrance enthusiasts

banner_details:
This banner design features an elegant and modern aesthetic for promoting a luxury unisex perfume. The background is composed of layered geometric patterns and subtle gradients to create depth, highlighted by polygonal shapes and translucent golden accents. A prominent product image is placed on the right, giving ample visibility to the perfume bottle with a gold cap. Text elements are distributed on the left side: the "heading" displays the brand in a serif font, "subheading" emphasizes the product name in bold yellow, and "tagline" introduces the product type. A bullet-point list under "description" outlines benefits. The "price" is highlighted in bold golden text, paired with a yellow rectangular "cta_button" containing "cta" for user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal: #0a3040
- Rich Cyan: #0C6D78
- Midnight Blue: #021a24
- Gold: #d4af37
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and refreshing color palette predominantly composed of aqua blue (#00B8C4) for the bottle, exuding a fresh and energetic vibe. This base color symbolizes vitality and cleanliness, ideal for a unisex fragrance. The cap is a metallic gold (#D4AF37), adding a sense of luxury and sophistication. Text elements are in a soft off-white (#F8F5E9), which contrasts well against the blue without overpowering it. The smooth blending of aqua gradients adds depth, while the reflective gold cap subtly highlights premium quality. For an advertisement banner, pairing aqua, gold, white, and light neutral tones creates a clean, stylish appeal.
